query:
-- 1.2.3 Update expenses table monetary columns to DECIMAL(24,8)
ALTER TABLE `expenses`
  MODIFY COLUMN `amount` DECIMAL(24,8) NOT NULL,
  MODIFY COLUMN `taxAmount` DECIMAL(24,8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00000000';
command:
